title: RP card redemption issue - 21/04/2016
body:
**UPDATE 23/04 @ 12:00pm AEST**
> Players should have now all received their RP. If anyone is still missing their RP, please submit a player support ticket and we will make sure you get your RP as fast as possible.

**UPDATE 22/04 @ 2:00pm AEST**
> While many players have successfully received their RP, it looks like we did miss some.  Our engineers are working to identify why this happened and fix it for everyone.


**UPDATE 22/04 @ 9:00am AEST**
> We've completed the rollback on the store visual update, and we've also given out RP for the missed transactions.
> Please take a look and confirm you have received your RP now.





**UPDATE 21/04 @ 4:00pm AEST**  
> We've identified the cause of the issue, and will be rolling back the visual update tomorrow once we have fully verified the fix.   Redeeming pre-purchased/gift cards for RP will remain disabled until then.
> 
> We'll also be finalizing all missed transactions at that stage, so if you have redeemed a code in the last 24 hours and not received RP, it will be delivered shortly afterwards.

**ORIGINAL POST**
> Hi folks,
> 
> We're aware of a problem that is causing players to be unable to successfully redeem RP gift cards.  I'll keep this thread up to date with more information as it is available.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar

replies.body:
Hi all

We've completed the rollback on the store visual update, and we've also given out RP for the missed transactions.

Please take a look and confirm you have received your RP now.

Cheers
Mindstar

Hey folks

Thanks for letting us know - we're taking a look to see why some of you got missed.

Cheers
Mindstar
Still no 50 dollars worth of rp in my account.
same
Im literally just logging in and logging out continuously just checking if my rp is here.
Still no Rp on my account..... Yawn......
3 days now RIOT, please fix this soon. Waiting for my $25
i dont think thats "some"
Please add my RP. You guys missed me . It's 2:01 pm still no $25 RP card worth in my account.
not really 'some' of us i think its 'most' of us

I sent in a ticket almost 3 days ago now with both off my Prepaid card codes If you could get on top off it it would be great my ticket id is 21354648 If needed I will post the codes here as they are redeemed but still no being granted the RP if you can get back to me as why we were missed or if anymore problems has arised it would be great thank you.
What happens if we havent gotten it do we just post here?

No RP for me yet. And all my ticket were "SOLVED" apparently, which I never even got a reply from you yet
i too checked but no RP has been given? ibought a $25 RP card and still no return?
i checked just then, but i didn't receive the rp.....what should i do?

Hi, I have not received my RP yet. There should be a support ticket sent in from 2 days ago if you need to contact me about it. If it is added within the next 7 hours I will not be able to check since I will not have access to a computer. Hope I will receive it soon.
Yeah if you need to contact me about the codes of the cards I use please contact me I just would like the RP as its been 3 days and I wanna buy Jhin and a few hextech chest >.< its killing me haha

Okay still counting Day 4 now and still yet to have my RP I brought, It was 2 $10 Prepaid cards which equals up to 2200 RP Dota 2 is now installing on my PC. This has gotten to a point now its well and truely over a joke. I expect to have my RP in my account tomorrow or I am going to be very displeased and Most likely  Blow. I dont think im the only one that is feeling this way. Hence the reason I download Dota is because on steam you know this wont happen and they wont take 4 days to fix a mistake made on their end. I look forward to logging on tomorrow and seeing the RP so I can enjoy my league of legends once again and act like non off this ever happened. Thank you all for your efforts but I would like it in my account today. 
Goodnight rioters, and everyone else who is still having this problem and thinking the same as what I just wrote. I wish you all the best night. 

DeathSouIja.
OMG THANK YOU RIOT!
ok i got it ,3 days
THANKS ROIT AFTER ALL THAT IM GREATFULL GOT ME RP BACK SOO HAPPY NOW I CAN PLAY LIKE FAKER LOOOOL
Thank you Riot, I have just now received my Rp. I hope everyone else in this thread is able to receive their RP soon too!
...thanks riot i have just received my rp

I HAVE NOT received my $25 RP

i giving all the information i can, and now u telling me to give my rp gift card's pic and reciept pic, who know where is my reciept, what i mean is that do u guys just want to playing with us rather giving our rp back right? if u guys acctually want to fix this problem, i think two day before it will be fix, so i want to say is if we not get rp back today, all of us gona blow up, because u guys are lazy or just don't want to give our rp back
I still havent got the RP..... Can you guys get on top off it...

I have not been given my $25 dollars worth of RP. It would be nice if you could please give it to me because i am not telling a lie. I think you can probably check that i have entered mine in. But it never gave me my RP.

rito, pls fix.{{item:3070}}
